R Training

Are you looking for on-site training courses in R and/or RStudio for your organization? Stefan is an RStudio instructing partner with lots of teaching experience who offers training near Denmark.

Read more...

Stefan's Bio

Stefan holds a PhD in Econometrics and a MSc in Economics and Finance. He is an active R developer with many years of teaching and practical experience from Academia and industry. He has a broad knowledge of both economics, statistical methods, data wrangling, and programming.

Read more...

Community

Stefan has co-founded CopenhagenR and Rhus, two R User Groups (RUGs). The groups are free to join and provide an opportunity to meet people active or interested in the R community.
